Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Polk. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Polk.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
